data.Name: Tyler, The Creator
data.Bio: Tyler Gregory Okonma (born March 6, 1991) is Tyler, The Creator, a Grammy award-winning American rapper, singer, record producer, director, fashion designer, and the head of his own independent record label, Odd Future Records. He is the leader of Los Angeles, California, USA hip-hop collective Odd Future Wolf Gang Kill Them All (OFWGKTA). Since his first recordings debuted on The Odd Future Tape in 2007, he has rapped on, and produced for, nearly every OFWGKTA release. Read more on Last.fm
